actions.args: {"body": {"name": "Annual Plan access to host unlimited HackBox Hackthons", "summary": "We propose an annual plan for the Near HackBox team to access TAIKAI, a comprehensive hackathon management platform. This plan is offered at a discounted cost of 20,000\\\\u{20ac}, providing extensive features to support and enhance community-driven hackathons.\\\\n", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "# Description:\\\\n\\\\n**About TAIKAI**\\\\nTAIKAI is an end-to-end hackathon management platform designed to facilitate seamless organization and execution of hackathons. With 6 years of experience in the hackathon industry, TAIKAI has honed its platform to be easy to use, featuring the best UI/UX for both participants and organizers, ensuring an enjoyable and efficient experience. TAIKAI makes it simple to create and manage hackathons, providing all the necessary tools to run successful events.\\\\n\\\\n**Why TAIKAI**\\\\nThe Near team can greatly benefit from TAIKAI\\\\u{2019}s extensive features to foster innovation, community engagement, and developer growth. By leveraging our platform, the Near team can efficiently manage hackathons, track participant engagement, and evaluate the success of these events with precision.\\\\n\\\\nFrom June 2023 to June 2024, TAIKAI has collaborated with the NEAR HackBox Team, supporting 8 community-driven Near hackathons. This collaboration highlights our commitment to fostering innovation and community engagement within the Near ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\n# List of Features and Services\\\\n**1. Expanding Hackathon Scope and Reach**\\\\nUnlimited Hackathons: Organize as many hackathons as needed without any limitations. This allows the Near team to continuously engage the community, foster innovation, and maintain a dynamic presence in the developer ecosystem. With no restrictions, multiple events can be hosted simultaneously or sequentially, targeting different themes or technologies.\\\\nUnlimited Participants: Engage with an unlimited number of participants to maximize community involvement. This inclusivity ensures that everyone interested in contributing can join, leading to diverse ideas and solutions. The larger the participant pool, the higher the chances of discovering exceptional talent and innovative projects.\\\\n\\\\n**2. Enhanced Hackathon Management and Support**\\\\nHackathon Manager Support: Receive 20 hours of dedicated support from our hackathon management experts for each event. This ensures smooth planning, execution, and post-event analysis. Our experts assist with setup, participant engagement, troubleshooting, and more, providing peace of mind and allowing organizers to focus on strategic aspects.\\\\nCustom Evaluation: Implement tailored evaluation criteria to accurately assess participant contributions and project quality. Custom evaluation frameworks can be designed to align with specific goals and standards, ensuring that the best projects are recognized and rewarded. This flexibility helps in maintaining high standards and relevance for each event.\\\\n\\\\n**3. Boosting Engagement and Visibility**\\\\nLive Streaming: Utilize our integrated live streaming feature to broadcast webinars, workshops, increasing visibility and engagement. Live streaming allows a wider audience to participate virtually, fostering a sense of community and excitement. It also provides an opportunity for real-time interaction, feedback, and showcases the event to stakeholders and the broader public.\\\\nLive Leaderboard: Keep participants and viewers informed with a live leaderboard that updates in real-time. This feature adds a competitive element, motivating participants to perform their best and keep track of their progress. It also enhances spectator engagement by providing up-to-date standings and creating a dynamic viewing experience.\\\\n\\\\n**4. Long-Term Community Value**\\\\nLifetime Access: All hackathon data will be accessible to the community organizers and the Near Team over a period of a lifetime. This ensures that valuable insights, project submissions, and participant information are preserved for future reference. Lifetime access aids in tracking progress, measuring impact, and informing future strategies.\\\\n\\\\n**5. Facilitating Collaboration and Innovation**\\\\nMatchmaking in Hackathons: Facilitate effective team formation and collaboration through our matchmaking feature. This tool helps participants find team members with complementary skills, enhancing the quality of projects and ensuring a well-rounded development process. Effective matchmaking promotes networking, collaboration, and the creation of diverse and robust teams.\\\\n\\\\n**6. Marketing and Promotion across TAIKAI\\\\u{2019}s community of participants**\\\\nCommunity Newsletter Promotion: TAIKAI will be helping the Near HackBox team promote the HackBox hackathon initiatives across TAIKAI\\\\u{2019}s community of 80,000+ builders from across the globe. \\\\nSocial Media Promotions: TAIKAI will also be promoting HackBox hackathon initiatives across social media on X and LinkedIn for onboarding followers and new participants to the Hackathons.\\\\nBy leveraging these extensive services, the Near team can effectively manage and maximize the impact of their hackathons, fostering a vibrant and innovative community.\\\\n\\\\n# Discounted Pricing\\\\nOur proposal offers a comprehensive annual plan of all features of our platform and premium hackathon management support at a discounted rate of 20,000\\\\u{20ac}, which includes unlimited hackathons, unlimited participants, 20 hours of hackathon manager platform support for each event, custom evaluation, and live streaming. \\\\n\\\\nThis special pricing is part of our commitment to support the Near team in driving community-driven hackathons and fostering developer engagement. \\\\n\\\\nBy choosing TAIKAI, the Near team will have access to a robust platform that simplifies hackathon management, enhances participant experience, and provides valuable insights to measure and improve Hackathon outcomes.\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "taikai.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "21500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "NEAR"}, "labels": ["Hackbox", "Hackathon"]}

{"data": {"events-committee.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Bounty* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @rubhan_taikai.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}Annual Plan access to host unlimited HackBox Hackthons\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nWe propose an annual plan for the Near HackBox team to access TAIKAI, a comprehensive hackathon management platform. This plan is offered at a discounted cost of 20,000\\\\u{20ac}, providing extensive features to support and enhance community-driven hackathons.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=16)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

This ensures smooth planning, execution, and post-event analysis. Our experts assist with setup, participant engagement, troubleshooting, and more, providing peace of mind and allowing organizers to focus on strategic aspects.\\\\nCustom Evaluation: Implement tailored evaluation criteria to accurately assess participant contributions and project quality. Custom evaluation frameworks can be designed to align with specific goals and standards, ensuring that the best projects are recognized and rewarded. This flexibility helps in maintaining high standards and relevance for each event.\\\\n\\\\n**3. Boosting Engagement and Visibility**\\\\nLive Streaming: Utilize our integrated live streaming feature to broadcast webinars, workshops, increasing visibility and engagement. Live streaming allows a wider audience to participate virtually, fostering a sense of community and excitement. It also provides an opportunity for real-time interaction, feedback, and showcases the event to stakeholders and the broader public.\\\\nLive Leaderboard: Keep participants and viewers informed with a live leaderboard that updates in real-time. This feature adds a competitive element, motivating participants to perform their best and keep track of their progress. Long-Term Community Value**\\\\nLifetime Access: All hackathon data will be accessible to the community organizers and the Near Team over a period of a lifetime. This ensures that valuable insights, project submissions, and participant information are preserved for future reference. Lifetime access aids in tracking progress, measuring impact, and informing future strategies.\\\\n\\\\n**5. Facilitating Collaboration and Innovation**\\\\nMatchmaking in Hackathons: Facilitate effective team formation and collaboration through our matchmaking feature. This tool helps participants find team members with complementary skills, enhancing the quality of projects and ensuring a well-rounded development process. Effective matchmaking promotes networking, collaboration, and the creation of diverse and robust teams.\\\\n\\\\n**6. Marketing and Promotion across TAIKAI\\\\u{2019}s community of participants**\\\\nCommunity Newsletter Promotion: TAIKAI will be helping the Near HackBox team promote the HackBox hackathon initiatives across TAIKAI\\\\u{2019}s community of 80,000+ builders from across the globe. \\\\nSocial Media Promotions: TAIKAI will also be promoting HackBox hackathon initiatives across social media on X and LinkedIn for onboarding followers and new participants to the Hackathons.\\\\nBy leveraging these extensive services, the Near team can effectively manage and maximize the impact of their hackathons, fostering a vibrant and innovative community.\\\\n\\\\n# Discounted Pricing\\\\nOur proposal offers a comprehensive annual plan of all features of our platform and premium hackathon management support at a discounted rate of 20,000\\\\u{20ac}, which includes unlimited hackathons, unlimited participants, 20 hours of hackathon manager platform support for each event, custom evaluation, and live streaming. \\\\n\\\\nThis special pricing is part of our commitment to support the Near team in driving community-driven hackathons and fostering developer engagement. \\\\n\\\\nBy choosing TAIKAI, the Near team will have access to a robust platform that simplifies hackathon management, enhances participant experience, and provides valuable insights to measure and improve Hackathon outcomes.\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "taikai.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "21500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "NEAR"}, "author_id": "rubhan_taikai.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"body": {"name": "Summary of Work Activities: Hackbox Product Manager (May 20 - June 20, 2024)", "summary": "A summary of all completed work activities between the specified date range, and all planned work for the next pay period.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "### Summary of Work Activities: Hackbox Product Manager (May 20 - June 20, 2024)\\\\n\\\\n- Attended weekly syncs with Events and Data teams\\\\n- Maintained the Hackathon data sheet by adding new repositories to the [repository list](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vE1MxaHzhWHNf9xHFYPucKsp86ZPnk-KtMytZH7CW5E/edit#gid=1897032744)\\\\n- Electric Capital dataset maintenance with Spencer Parl\\\\n- Three Hackbox events concluded in Berlin, Tunisia, and Toronto\\\\n- Coordinated the creation and delivery of Hackbox Q2 post-event reports. [Toronto report](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=3306). [Tunisia report](https://near.social/devgovgigs.near/widget/Post?id=3308)\\\\n- Coordinated delivery of prizes to winners from Hackbox Q2 events on NEAR HEROES\\\\n- Drafting Hackbox Q2 report, planned posting on July 1, 2024\\\\n- Evaluating Hackbox Q3 proposals and potential collaborators, screening the following teams\\\\n\\\\t- NEAR Malaysia (Yuen)\\\\n\\\\t- Blink AI\\\\n\\\\t- Vandigital\\\\n- Supported the development of the [EthCC Hacker House](https://near.social/events-committee.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=9) proposal and event plan\\\\n- Hackbox website sitemap in progress on Figma\\\\n- DevHub Live feature discussing EthCC Hacker House\\\\n- OpenQ Developer Relationship Management onboarding, target loading and analyses\\\\n\\\\n#### Timeline\\\\nStart: May 20 2024\\\\nEnd date: June 20 2024\\\\nTotal hours per week: 45\\\\nTotal hours: 180\\\\nHourly rate: $50/hr\\\\nTotal: $9000", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "discoballer.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "9000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackbox", "Hackathon"]}
